author: @todonoticias
title: Juegos Olímpicos: la repudiable agresión de un fanático francés a una estrella estadounidense de básquet | TN
text:
Joel Embiid , estrella de la NBA , recibió una fuerte agresión de parte de un fanático francés antes de su debut en los Juegos Olímpicos de París 2024 .
Leé también: París 2024: la insólita frase de la ministra de Deportes de Francia tras el escándalo en Argentina-Marruecos
El integrante del Dream Team , el temible equipo de básquet de los Estados Unidos, sufrió un mal momento cuando se disponía a subirse al micro con el resto de sus compañeros.
“Devolvé el pasaporte” , le gritó un hombre cuando salió Embiid. El pivot de 2,13 metros de altura nació en Camerún y tiene dos ciudadanías más: la estadounidense y la francesa .
En 2022, se había naturalizado francés para sumarse a esa selección y despertaba mucha ilusión, aunque también cierto recelo , ya que nunca vivió en ese país. Sin embargo, habla bien el idioma y consiguió superar los trámites para naturalizarse.
Embiid nació en Camerún y tiene dos ciudadanías más: la estadounidense y la francesa. (Foto: REUTERS/Amr Alfiky) Por: REUTERS De todos modos, nunca utilizó ese papel, ya que también se hizo ciudadano estadounidense y participará de los Juegos Olímpicos con el combinado norteamericano.
La Selección de básquet de los Estados Unidos debutará este domingo ante Serbia por el Grupo C. Luego se medirá con Sudán del Sur y cerrará su zona ante Puerto Rico. Como en cada edición de los Juegos Olímpicos, es el gran favorito para quedarse con el oro.

author: 吳孟潔
title: 台積電嘉義廠工安事故頻傳 2個月內釀1死3重傷
text:
中天新聞網 台積電嘉義廠工安事故頻傳 2個月內釀1死3重傷 閱讀全文
吳孟潔 2025年7月17日 上午5:33 台積電位於嘉義科學園區的先進封裝廠工安意外頻傳，昨（16）日下午再度發生工安事故，一名工人遭重達300公斤的機電用冰水管砸中頭部，造成嚴重傷勢，這已是該廠區近兩個月內第4起工安意外。
台積電嘉義先進封裝廠正在趕工興建中，16日又傳工安意外。（示意圖／中天新聞資料照） 該 意外發生在16日下午4時許，一支重達2-300公斤的機電用冰水管在安裝過程中，疑因未確實固定而從5樓墜落，砸中地面一名工人，導致該名工人頭部受到嚴重外傷，並出現腦出血症狀，送醫時血壓偏低且意識模糊，目前仍在急診室觀察中。
台積電嘉義封裝廠吊掛作業意外，一工人遭變電箱砸中不治。（圖／民眾提供） 回顧台積電嘉義廠區近期工安事故，5月20日曾有工人從4樓高鷹架墜落，雖然搶救成功但可能造成半身不遂。一週後的5月26日上午10時許，同棟廠房發生吊掛作業意外，一具重達2噸的變壓器從天而降，當場造成一名工人死亡。之後又發生一起工人遭堆高機輾過、造成小腿粉碎性骨折的事故。
值得注意的是，台積電嘉義廠區去年5月曾在開挖工程中發現人骨遺骸，當時已委託考古團隊進行搶救。嘉義縣文化觀光局指出，該遺址出土遺物主要為繩紋陶容器及其破片，另有少量石刀、箭鏃、貝殼、獸骨等，同時發現約90個灰坑及數具兒童和成年個體墓葬，但出土物年代仍待進一步鑑定。
台積電嘉義廠工安意外頻傳。（圖／中天新聞） 延伸閱讀
topics: Disaster and Accident->industrial accident and incident

author: Liliana Coelho
title: Papa Francisco está em "estado crítico"
text:
Papa Francisco está em “estado crítico”
Durante a manhã, o Papa Francisco teve uma crise respiratória asmática prolongada, que obrigou à administração de oxigénio, além de ter recebido também transfusões de sangue
Durante a manhã, o Papa Francisco teve uma crise respiratória asmática prolongada, que obrigou à administração de oxigénio, além de ter recebido também transfusões de sangue
Jornalista
O Papa Francisco mantém um prognóstico “reservado” e "não está fora de perigo", segundo o último boletim médico, divulgado na tarde deste sábado.
Durante a manhã, o Pontífice teve uma crise respiratória asmática prolongada, que obrigou à administração de oxigénio, além de ter recebido também transfusões de sangue.
“O estado do Santo Padre continua a ser crítico, pelo que, como explicado ontem, o Papa não está fora de perigo. Esta manhã, o Papa Francisco apresentou uma crise respiratória asmática prolongada, que exigiu também a aplicação de oxigénio a altos fluxos. As análises sanguíneas de hoje revelaram também uma platelopénia, associada a anemia, que exigiu a administração de hemotransfusões”, pode ler-se no boletim clínico, divulgado pelo Vaticano.
Depois de um primeiro boletim médico divulgado na manhã deste sábado, onde se dava conta de que o Papa Francisco tinha tido uma “noite de sono tranquila”, a evolução do seu estado de saúde não foi favorável.
“O Santo Padre continua alerta e passou o dia numa poltrona, embora com mais dores do que ontem. De momento, o prognóstico é reservado”, conclui o boletim.
De manhã, a Santa Sé já tinha informado que não haveria o Angelus dominical, na segunda-feira, com o Papa, apenas a "publicação do texto do Santo Padre".
Há uma semana que Francisco, de 88 anos, está internado devido a uma pneumonia bilateral.
Tem dúvidas, sugestões ou críticas? Envie-me um e-mail: lpcoelho@expresso.impresa.pt

author: Valley City Times-Record
title: Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning Earns Home Hero Award: National Real Estate Network Recognizes Excellence in Home Services | User | times-online.com
text: Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning appreciates the validation of their hard work and dedication to the home service industry (PRUnderground) February 29th, 2024 Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning, a leading specialist in professional clothes dryer maintenance and service in Raleigh, is excited to announce their recent receipt of the prestigious Home Hero Award from the National Real Estate Network. This significant honor underscores Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning’s unwavering dedication to excellence within the home service sector and their esteemed reputation among real estate professionals and property managers. The Home Hero Award, bestowed by the National Real Estate Network, recognizes companies that exhibit exceptional expertise and dependability in their respective fields. Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning has been singled out for this esteemed recognition due to their outstanding track record in delivering high-quality dryer vent cleaning services and their unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction. “We are deeply grateful to be granted the Home Hero Award from the National Real Estate Network,” expressed a spokesperson for Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning. “This acknowledgment serves as a testament to our team’s tireless efforts and unwavering dedication to delivering exceptional service to our valued customers in Raleigh and its environs. We are honored to be regarded as a dependable service provider within the real estate industry.” Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning is renowned for their proficiency in a wide range of dryer vent services, including cleaning, repair, and new installations, all executed with precision using top-of-the-line materials to ensure optimal safety and efficiency for both residential and commercial clients. Their team of skilled professionals employs cutting-edge equipment and methodologies to eliminate lint, debris, and potential fire hazards from dryer vents, thus promoting fire prevention and energy efficiency. The receipt of the Home Hero Award further solidifies Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning’s position as a trusted and reputable service provider in the real estate realm. As a result of this distinguished recognition, they will be recommended to members of the National Real Estate Network, thereby broadening their outreach and potential client base. Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning’s attainment of Home Hero Award Status underscores their unwavering commitment to excellence and their steadfast dedication to upholding the highest industry standards. They remain steadfast in their mission to serve the Raleigh community and fulfill the needs of their clientele with unparalleled professionalism and integrity. For more information about Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning and their professional dryer vent services, please contact them at (984) 230-4060 or visit their website at https://rydersdryerventcleaningraleigh.blogspot.com/ . Find them at https://maps.app.goo.gl/WTyvUPhrHEbJnGzg7 About National Real Estate Network National Real Estate Investors Network is proud to host real estate investing events for beginners as well as seasoned investors in various areas of the industry, including Wholesaling Real Estate, Find, Fix, & Flip, Landlording and Commercial Real Estate. They offer mentoring through several platforms including Facebook Live, YouTube Videos, Webinars and more. In addition, this is a great group for getting referrals to various reputable companies who support the industry, including real estate agents, title companies, insurance providers, attorneys, rehab contractors and home service providers. Visit to learn more about this Real Estate Network of Professionals at https://www.meetup.com/27monthlymeetup-com/ The post Ryder’s Dryer Vent Cleaning Earns Home Hero Award: National Real Estate Network Recognizes Excellence in Home Services first appeared on Original Press Release .

author: MarketScreener
title: Hangzhou, Shanghai broil as extreme heat engulfs eastern China - MarketScreener
text:
HANGZHOU, China (Reuters) - Mega-cities on China's eastern coast are facing another spell of scorching heat as temperatures hovered around 40 Celsius (104 Fahrenheit) on Friday and prolonged extreme temperatures were expected to run into next week.
The Shanghai Meteorological Center on Thursday issued the first red warning signal for high temperatures this year after the sprawling metropolis hit 40C, logging the 22nd day of temperatures over 40C since its Xujiahui weather station began tracking data in 1873.
In nearby Hangzhou, officials issued a red warning early on Friday, with some areas in Shangcheng district, Binjiang district, Gongshu district, and Xihu district hitting 40C. A red warning is the most severe in a three-tiered warning temperature system.
"It's so hot, like fire falling from the sky," said Wang, a 60-year-old tourist who travelled to Hangzhou from the cooler northern province of Hebei. "I'm sweating all over. There is wind but it is hot."
China recorded its hottest July in recent history on record, while July 22 was the hottest day ever recorded, according to the European Union's Copernicus Climate Change Service, which has tracked such global weather patterns since 1940.
Chinese weather forecasters also issued warnings for high temperatures for many parts of the country with Anhui, Jiangsu, Hubei, Jiangxi, Zhejiang, and Fujian provinces, Chongqing and Shanghai expected to see temperatures around 37-39C, and some areas at 40C or higher.
Treacherous heatwaves are becoming the norm in China as experts blame global climate changes for extreme weather conditions across the world.
"It's so hot and I am sweating all the time," said Li Wen, a 22-year-old tourist visiting Shanghai. "Everyone is wearing sun protection shirts, holding parasols, and taking precautions against the sunshine."
The country is bearing through yet another summer of torrid heat and weather experts expect more hotter and longer heatwaves for the foreseeable future.
(Reporting by Nicoco Chan and Xihao Jiang in Hangzhou and Bernard Orr in Beijing; Additional writing by Liz Lee; Editing by Tomasz Janowski)
By Nicoco Chan, Xihao Jiang and Bernard Orr
Share © Reuters - 2024

author: 孫磊
title: 各地各部門積極行動防汛防颱風及地質災害救災 爭分奪秒搶險救援
text:
> 視頻播放位置
下載安裝Flash播放器
央視網消息： 我國西南、華北部分地區出現了強降雨天氣，造成交通受阻、人員被困等情況。對此，各地各部門積極應對，爭分奪秒展開搶險救援。
受颱風“丹娜絲”影響，從9日淩晨開始，福建寧德多地出現強降雨天氣。據統計，截至9日6時，寧德共有5個縣（市、區）26個鄉鎮24小時累計雨量超過100毫米。其中，最大雨量出現在漳灣鎮，達155.5毫米。受此影響，漳灣鎮多處出現積水內澇，相關部門緊急開展搶險工作。
受颱風“丹娜絲”影響，浙江台州三門縣大橫渡村的多名村民8日在山中遇暴雨漲水，被困山中無法返回，而此時，河水還在不斷上漲。危急時刻，兩名消防員在穿戴防護裝備後，立即駕駛橡皮艇前往河對岸，拋出救援繩，搭建起救援通道。經過接力救援，7名被困人員全部脫困，所幸身體均無大礙。
這兩天，我國西南地區多地也遭遇了大範圍強降雨天氣。從7月8日7時開始到9日7時，雲南省昭通市威信縣和鎮雄縣普降暴雨，其中，威信縣最大降水量達227.8毫米。據初步統計，截至9日7時，威信縣道路坍塌受損200余處、交通中斷40余處、房屋被淹150余戶。當地第一時間啟動應急救援預案，搶險救援。
8日晚到9日清晨，貴州遵義習水縣遭遇強降雨襲擊，導致縣城多處低窪地帶積水嚴重，道路被淹、房屋進水，多名群眾被困。當地消防部門展開救援，但因部分地區通道狹窄，舟艇無法通行，消防人員將繩索係在身上，涉水進入民房展開搜救。
經過仔細搜尋，消防人員在房屋二樓發現7名被困人員，其中包括一名行動不便的老人。在做好安全防護措施後，消防人員將老人背出，並轉移至安全地帶，隨後又陸續將其餘被困人員救出。
重慶也受到強降雨的影響。在大渡口區鋼花路紅樓醫院附近，消防人員發現一名摩托車騎手被困水中，有被沖走的危險。經過救援，該男子被轉移至安全地帶。據介紹，目前，大渡口區消防救援局共處置相關警情16起，出動130余人次參與救援工作。
四川宜賓：多地遭遇強降雨 緊急救援轉移被困群眾
7月8日19時至7月9日9時，四川省宜賓市局部出現大暴雨天氣，部分地區中雨到小雨。9日上午，宜賓市氣象臺將暴雨藍色預警升級為暴雨黃色預警。長寧縣、江安縣、高縣等地啟動防汛四級應急響應。強降雨導致多人被困，當地全力組織救援。
在宜賓珙縣上羅鎮，街道積水已經有一米多深，部分地方積水已淹沒一樓，有不少群眾被困，救援人員在齊腰深的積水中採取接力方式轉移被困群眾。在一樓淹沒區域，消防救援人員通過架設爬梯，將被困在二樓的群眾轉移至橡皮艇，送往安全區域。強降雨還導致珙縣曹營鎮、羅渡苗族鄉等地出現大範圍停電，部分道路因積水無法通行，通信出現異常。
截至9日14時，當地降雨已停，正在有序組織清淤和災情核查。
財政部、應急管理部緊急預撥1.5億元資金支援6省份防汛防臺及地質災害救災
7月9日，財政部、應急管理部緊急預撥1.5億元中央自然災害救災資金，重點支援浙江、福建、四川、重慶、西藏、甘肅6省（區、市）開展災害應急搶險救援和受災群眾救助工作，統籌做好搜救轉移安置受災人員、排危除險等應急處置、次生災害隱患排查、倒損民房修復等工作。
http://images.china.cn/site1000/2025-07/10/117971752_a3330e68-7d79-4a64-9292-b33e1e1e8a56.png 【責任編輯：孫磊】 客戶端中查看

author: Olimpíada Todo Dia
title: Boxe levará três atletas olímpicos à COB Expo
text: O boxe promete ser uma das grandes atrações da COB Expo, que acontece entre os dias 25 e 29 de setembro. A tradicional feira de esportes realizada pelo Comitê Olímpico do Brasil (COB) será realizada no Pro Magno, Zona Norte de São Paulo. Por lá, os pugilistas como Bárbara Santos (peso meio-médio até 66kg), Abner Teixeira (super-pesado acima de 92kg) e Wanderley Pereira (meio-pesado até 80kg), todos presentes nos Jogos Olímpicos de Paris 2024 estão confirmados no evento. Outros nomes que fizeram parte do Time Brasil também poderão aparecer. Para interagir com os visitantes, a CBBoxe prepara um treino aberto para o público na próxima quarta-feira (25), das 10h às 15h. Além do treinamento, os atletas também ficarão à disposição para um bate-papo com o público da feira. Entre os dias 27 e 29, por exemplo, haverá uma competição oficial organizada pela Confederação Brasileira de Boxe (CBBoxe). Nomeado como 'Desafio Recoma de Boxe', o campeonato terá, ao todo, 70 participantes entre pugilistas das mais diversas categorias e treinadores. Além, é claro, de 14 árbitros que virão de São Paulo, Rio de Janeiro, Minas Gerais, Santa Catarina e Espírito Santo. Na próxima quarta-feira (25), das 19h às 20h, também está previsto que o local receba uma clínica de boxe. Além diddo, haverá um bate-papo com Fernando Menoncello "Bolacha", presidente da Federação Estadual de Boxe de São Paulo e criador do projeto "Das Ruas Para Os Ringues". + SIGA O OTD NO , TWITTER, , ,

author: web desk
title: Boeing worker strike: 33,000 union members reject contract offer
text: Thousands of Boeing workers walked off jobs after rejecting contract offers. According to CBS News, 33,000 machinists of Boeing early on Friday, September 13, walked off work from the factories in Washington, Oregon, and California after the union with the highest majority voted against the new contract offering a 25% increase in wages over four years. The strike came as a new major blow for the company, which was already dealing with the financial losses and damaged reputation. As per Boeing, the machinists of the company on average earn $75,608 per year (excluding overtime), and after the new contract, the average revenue would rise to $106,350 after four years. However, the company, after the announcement of the strike, asserted that it is ‘ready to get back to the table to reach a new agreement.’ Boeing stated, “The message was clear that the tentative agreement we reached with IAM leadership was not acceptable to the members. We remain committed to resetting our relationship with our employees and the union.” Furthermore, the aerospace company stock experienced a decline of 2.2% in the morning trading, bringing the loss of the company to 38.9% till now in 2024. To note, the strike will not affect commercial flights but will become a new problem for a company already in trouble because of manufacturing issues and government investigations.
